00059 syx_bool syx_system_initialized = FALSE;
00060 
00061 static syx_string _syx_root_path;
00062 static syx_string _syx_image_path;
00063 static syx_varsize _syx_argc;
00064 static syx_string *_syx_argv;
00065 
00066 static void _syx_file_in_basic (void);
00067 static void _syx_file_in_basic_decl (void);
00068 static SyxOop _syx_create_class (syx_varsize instanceSize);
00069 
00076 syx_string 
00077 syx_find_file (syx_symbol domain, syx_symbol package, syx_symbol filename)
00078 {
00079   syx_string full_path;
00080 
00081   if (!domain || !package || !filename)
00082     return NULL;
00083 
00084   full_path = (syx_string) syx_calloc (strlen (_syx_root_path)
00085                                        + strlen (domain)
00086                                        + strlen (package)
00087                                        + strlen (filename) + 4, sizeof (syx_char));
00088 
00089   sprintf (full_path, "%s%c%s%c%s%c%s",
00090            _syx_root_path, SYX_PATH_SEPARATOR,
00091            domain, SYX_PATH_SEPARATOR,
00092            package, SYX_PATH_SEPARATOR,
00093            filename);
00094 
00095   return full_path;
00096 }
00097 
00098 static void
00099 _syx_file_in_basic_decl (void)
00100 {
00101   syx_string full_filename;
00102 
00103   full_filename = syx_find_file ("st", "kernel", "initialDecl.st");
00104   syx_cold_file_in (full_filename);
00105   syx_free (full_filename);
00106 }
00107 
00108 static void
00109 _syx_file_in_basic (void)
00110 {
00111   syx_symbol *filename;
00112   syx_string full_filename;
00113   static syx_symbol kernel_filenames[] = {
00114     "Behavior.st", "Metaclass.st",
00115     "Symbol.st",
00116     "Magnitude.st", "Number.st", "Integer.st", "SmallInteger.st", "LargeInteger.st", "Fraction.st", "Float.st",
00117     "Object.st", "UndefinedObject.st", "ObjectMemory.st",
00118     "Collection.st", "ArrayedCollection.st", "SequenceableCollection.st", "OrderedCollection.st",
00119     "Stack.st",
00120     "Character.st", "ByteArray.st", "String.st",
00121     "ContextPart.st", "BlockContext.st",
00122     "BlockClosure.st",
00123     "True.st", "False.st",
00124     "Signal.st", "Exception.st", "SystemSignal.st",
00125     "Process.st", "ProcessorScheduler.st", "Semaphore.st",
00126     "CompiledMethod.st",
00127     "Association.st",
00128     "Stream.st", "Random.st", "PositionableStream.st", "WriteStream.st", "FileStream.st",
00129     "TextCollector.st",
00130     "Interval.st",
00131     "Set.st", "Bag.st",
00132     "Dictionary.st", "IdentityDictionary.st", "SystemDictionary.st",
00133     "Date.st", "DateTime.st",
00134     "Compiler.st",
00135     "MVC.st",
00136     "CommandLine.st", "Console.st",
00137     "WinWorkspace.st",
00138     NULL
00139   };
00140 
00141   static syx_symbol foreign_filenames[] = {
00142     "CPointer.st", "CObject.st",
00143     "CStructFieldType.st", "CStructFieldTypePointer.st", "CStructFieldSpec.st",
00144     "CStructGenerator.st", "CStruct.st",
00145     "CUnionGenerator.st", "CUnion.st",
00146     NULL
00147   };
00148 
00149   for (filename = kernel_filenames; *filename; filename++)
00150     {
00151       full_filename = syx_find_file ("st", "kernel", *filename);
00152       syx_cold_file_in (full_filename);
00153       syx_free (full_filename);
00154     }
00155 
00156   for (filename = foreign_filenames; *filename; filename++)
00157     {
00158       full_filename = syx_find_file ("st", "foreign", *filename);
00159       syx_cold_file_in (full_filename);
00160       syx_free (full_filename);
00161     }
00162 }
00163 
00164 static SyxOop
00165 _syx_create_class (syx_varsize instanceSize)
00166 {
00167   SyxOop object = syx_object_new_vars (syx_nil, SYX_VARS_CLASS_CLASS_ALL);
00168   SYX_CLASS_INSTANCE_SIZE(object) = syx_small_integer_new (instanceSize);
00169   return object;
00170 }
00171 
00182 void
00183 syx_build_basic (void)
00184 {
00185   SyxOop Object, Behavior, Class;
00186   SyxOop context;
00187   SyxOop process;
00188   static char *symbols[] = {"Transcript", "stdin", "stdout", NULL};
00189   char **sym;
00190 
00191   syx_memory_clear ();
00192   syx_memory_init (SYX_INIT_MEMORY_SIZE);
00193 
00194   /* allocate constants */
00195   syx_nil = syx_memory_alloc ();
00196   syx_true = syx_memory_alloc ();
00197   syx_false = syx_memory_alloc ();
00198 
00199   /* create raw instances of basic classes */
00200   Object = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_OBJECT_ALL);
00201   Behavior = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_CLASS_ALL);
00202   Class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_CLASS_CLASS_ALL);
00203   syx_symbol_class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_SYMBOL_ALL);
00204   syx_string_class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_STRING_ALL);
00205   syx_small_integer_class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_OBJECT_ALL);
00206   syx_character_class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_OBJECT_ALL);
00207   syx_byte_array_class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_OBJECT_ALL);
00208   syx_array_class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_OBJECT_ALL);
00209   syx_variable_binding_class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_VARIABLE_BINDING_ALL);
00210   syx_dictionary_class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_DICTIONARY_ALL);
00211   syx_metaclass_class = _syx_create_class (SYX_VARS_METACLASS_ALL);
00212 
00213   syx_globals = syx_dictionary_new (200);
00214   /* hold SystemDictionary instance variables */
00215   syx_free (SYX_OBJECT_VARS(syx_globals));
00216   SYX_OBJECT_VARS(syx_globals) = (SyxOop *) syx_calloc (SYX_VARS_DICTIONARY_ALL + 4, sizeof (SyxOop));
00217 
00218   syx_symbols = syx_dictionary_new (1000);
00219   syx_globals_at_put (syx_symbol_new ("Smalltalk"), syx_globals);
00220 
00221 #define _SETUP_CLASS(name, klass, superclass)                           \
00222   syx_object_set_class (klass, syx_metaclass_new (syx_object_get_class (superclass))); \
00223   SYX_METACLASS_INSTANCE_CLASS(syx_object_get_class (klass)) = klass;   \
00224   SYX_CLASS_SUPERCLASS(klass) = superclass;                             \
00225   SYX_CLASS_NAME(klass) = syx_symbol_new (name);                        \
00226   SYX_CLASS_SUBCLASSES(klass) = syx_array_new (0, NULL);                \
00227   syx_globals_at_put (SYX_CLASS_NAME(klass), klass)
00228 
00229   SYX_CLASS_SUBCLASSES(Class) = syx_array_new (0, NULL);
00230   syx_object_set_class (Object, syx_metaclass_new (Class));
00231   SYX_METACLASS_INSTANCE_CLASS(syx_object_get_class (Object)) = Object;
00232   SYX_CLASS_SUPERCLASS(Object) = syx_nil;
00233   SYX_CLASS_NAME(Object) = syx_symbol_new ("Object");
00234   SYX_CLASS_SUBCLASSES(Object) = syx_array_new (0, NULL);
00235   syx_globals_at_put (SYX_CLASS_NAME(Object), Object);
00236 
00237   _SETUP_CLASS ("Behavior", Behavior, Object);
00238   _SETUP_CLASS ("Class", Class, Behavior);
00239   _SETUP_CLASS ("Metaclass", syx_metaclass_class, Behavior);
00240   _SETUP_CLASS ("Symbol", syx_symbol_class, Object);
00241   _SETUP_CLASS ("ByteArray", syx_byte_array_class, Object);
00242   _SETUP_CLASS ("String", syx_string_class, syx_byte_array_class);
00243   _SETUP_CLASS ("SmallInteger", syx_small_integer_class, Object);
00244   _SETUP_CLASS ("Character", syx_character_class, Object);
00245   _SETUP_CLASS ("Array", syx_array_class, Object);
00246   _SETUP_CLASS ("VariableBinding", syx_variable_binding_class, Object);
00247   _SETUP_CLASS ("Dictionary", syx_dictionary_class, Object);
00248   _syx_file_in_basic_decl ();
00249 
00250   syx_object_set_class (syx_globals, syx_globals_at ("SystemDictionary"));
00251   SYX_OBJECT(syx_nil)->klass = syx_globals_at ("UndefinedObject");
00252   SYX_OBJECT(syx_true)->klass = syx_globals_at ("True");
00253   SYX_OBJECT(syx_false)->klass = syx_globals_at ("False");
00254 
00255   syx_fetch_basic ();
00256   
00257   /* these will be filled later, now we'll create a binding for method declarations */
00258   for (sym=symbols; *sym; sym++)
00259     syx_globals_at_put (syx_symbol_new (*sym), syx_nil);
00260    
00261   _syx_file_in_basic ();
00262 
00263   process = syx_process_new ();
00264   context = syx_send_unary_message (syx_globals, "initializeFirstSystem");
00265   syx_interp_enter_context (process, context);
00266   syx_process_execute_blocking (process);
00267 }
00268 
00269 /*
00270   Fetch all the things needed by the VM to run accordly to the image
00271 
00272   Sets up syx_nil, syx_true and syx_false constants.
00273   Lookup all classes from the Smalltalk dictionary and insert them into the VM.
00274   Then initialize the interpreter, the errors system and the scheduler.
00275   Finally send SystemDictionary>>#initializeSystem: to initialize everything else from within Smalltalk
00276 */
00277 void
00278 syx_fetch_basic (void)
00279 {
00280   syx_nil = (SyxOop)(syx_memory);
00281   syx_true = (SyxOop)(syx_memory + 1);
00282   syx_false = (SyxOop)(syx_memory + 2);
00283 
00284   syx_metaclass_class = syx_globals_at ("Metaclass");
00285   syx_undefined_object_class = syx_globals_at ("UndefinedObject");
00286   syx_symbol_class = syx_globals_at ("Symbol");
00287   syx_string_class = syx_globals_at ("String");
00288   syx_small_integer_class = syx_globals_at ("SmallInteger");
00289   syx_large_integer_class = syx_globals_at ("LargeInteger");
00290   syx_float_class = syx_globals_at ("Float");
00291   syx_character_class = syx_globals_at ("Character");
00292   syx_byte_array_class = syx_globals_at ("ByteArray");
00293   syx_array_class = syx_globals_at ("Array");
00294   syx_variable_binding_class = syx_globals_at ("VariableBinding");
00295   syx_dictionary_class = syx_globals_at ("Dictionary");
00296   syx_cpointer_class = syx_globals_at ("CPointer");
00297 
00298   syx_compiled_method_class = syx_globals_at ("CompiledMethod");
00299   syx_compiled_block_class = syx_globals_at ("CompiledBlock");
00300   syx_block_closure_class = syx_globals_at ("BlockClosure");
00301   syx_method_context_class = syx_globals_at ("MethodContext");
00302   syx_block_context_class = syx_globals_at ("BlockContext");
00303   syx_process_class = syx_globals_at ("Process");
00304   syx_processor_scheduler_class = syx_globals_at ("ProcessorScheduler");
00305 
00306   syx_globals_at_put (syx_symbol_new ("ImageFileName"), syx_string_new (_syx_image_path));
00307 
00308   syx_interp_init ();
00309   syx_error_init ();
00310   syx_scheduler_init ();
00311   syx_plugins_init ();
00312   syx_signal_init ();
00313 }
00314 
00317 void
00318 syx_initialize_system (void)
00319 {
00320   SyxOop context;
00321   SyxOop process;
00322   SyxOop arguments = syx_array_new_size (_syx_argc);
00323   syx_varsize i;
00324 
00325   for (i=0; i < _syx_argc; i++)
00326     SYX_OBJECT_DATA(arguments)[i] = syx_string_new (_syx_argv[i]);
00327 
00328   process = SYX_OBJECT_VARS(syx_globals)[3];
00329   if (!SYX_IS_NIL (process))
00330     syx_scheduler_remove_process (process);
00331 
00332   /* initialize the system */
00333   process = syx_process_new ();
00334   context = syx_send_binary_message (syx_globals, "initializeSystem:", arguments);
00335   syx_interp_enter_context (process, context);
00336   syx_process_execute_blocking (process);
00337 
00338   syx_system_initialized = TRUE;
00339 }
00340 
00346 syx_bool
00347 syx_init (syx_varsize argc, syx_string *argv, syx_symbol root_path)
00348 {
00349   static syx_bool initialized = FALSE;   
00350   if (initialized || !syx_set_root_path (root_path))
00351     return FALSE;
00352 
00353   _syx_argc = argc;
00354   _syx_argv = argv;
00355 
00356 #ifdef WINCE
00357   _syx_image_path = "\\default.sim";
00358   goto end;
00359 #endif
00360 
00361   /* first look in the root directory */
00362   if (root_path && !strcmp (root_path, _syx_root_path))
00363     {
00364       _syx_image_path = (syx_string) syx_malloc (strlen (_syx_root_path) + 13);
00365       sprintf ((syx_string) _syx_image_path, "%s%c%s", _syx_root_path, SYX_PATH_SEPARATOR, "default.sim");
00366       initialized = TRUE;
00367       return TRUE;
00368     }
00369 
00370   /* first look in the working directory */
00371 #ifdef HAVE_ACCESS
00372   if (access ("default.sim", R_OK) == 0)
00373 #else
00374   if (fopen ("default.sim", "r"))
00375 #endif
00376     {
00377       _syx_image_path = "default.sim";
00378       goto end;
00379     }
00380 
00381   /* then look in the environment */
00382 #ifdef HAVE_GETENV
00383   _syx_image_path = getenv ("SYX_IMAGE_PATH");
00384   if (_syx_image_path)
00385     goto end;
00386 #endif
00387   
00388   /* return the default path defined by the installation */
00389   _syx_image_path = SYX_IMAGE_PATH;
00390 
00391  end:
00392    
00393   _syx_image_path = syx_strdup (_syx_image_path);
00394   initialized = TRUE;
00395   return TRUE;
00396 }
00397 
00403 void
00404 syx_quit (void)
00405 {
00406   syx_memory_clear ();
00407   syx_interp_quit ();
00408   syx_plugins_quit ();
00409   syx_scheduler_quit ();
00410   syx_error_clear ();
00411 
00412   syx_free (_syx_image_path);
00413   syx_free (_syx_root_path);
00414 
00415   syx_profile_print ();
00416 }
00417 
00423 syx_symbol 
00424 syx_get_root_path (void)
00425 {
00426   return _syx_root_path;
00427 }
00428 
00435 syx_bool
00436 syx_set_root_path (syx_symbol root_path)
00437 {
00438   if (!root_path)
00439     {
00440 #ifdef HAVE_GETENV
00441       if (getenv ("SYX_ROOT_PATH"))
00442         root_path = getenv ("SYX_ROOT_PATH");
00443       else
00444 #endif
00445         root_path = SYX_ROOT_PATH;
00446     }
00447 
00448   if (_syx_root_path)
00449      syx_free (_syx_root_path);
00450 
00451   _syx_root_path = syx_strdup (root_path);
00452 
00453 #ifdef HAVE_ACCESS
00454   if (access (_syx_root_path, R_OK) < 0)
00455      return FALSE;
00456 #endif
00457 
00458   return TRUE;
00459 }
00460 
00462 syx_bool
00463 syx_set_image_path (syx_symbol image_path)
00464 {
00465   if (!image_path)
00466      return FALSE;
00467    
00468   if (_syx_image_path)
00469     syx_free (_syx_image_path);
00470 
00471   _syx_image_path = syx_strdup (image_path);
00472   return TRUE;
00473 }
00474 
00480 syx_symbol
00481 syx_get_image_path (void)
00482 {
00483   return _syx_image_path;
00484 }
